articles.title: Overwatch 2: Invasion Trailer Reveals New Support Hero Illari - Forbes
articles.description: Blizzard has finally shown off new Overwatch 2 hero Illari ahead of her debut in the Invasion season, which goes live on Thursday. Check out the latest trailer here.
articles.content:
Illari is Overwatch 2's newest hero.
